title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including the desired features, functionalities, performance expectations, security considerations, and compliance requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews, analyze industry standards and best practices, and research existing threat hunting solutions to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project scope.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, data flow, and integration points for the ThreatHuntingPlatform.

title: Develop Machine Learning Models
description: Research, develop, and train machine learning models for threat detection and analysis.

title: Implement Expert System
description: Design and implement the expert system component for rule-based threat analysis and decision-making.

title: Design Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement a scalable, high-performance, and secure data storage and management system for storing and processing threat data, logs, and analysis results. The system should support ingesting data from various sources, efficient querying and retrieval, data archiving, and integration with other components of the platform.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including dashboards, visualizations, and user interactions.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement security measures, access controls, and data protection mechanisms for the ThreatHuntingPlatform.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Establish a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the ThreatHuntingPlatform. The pipeline should include steps for code linting, static analysis, unit testing, integration testing, and security scanning. Additionally, it should support multiple environments (e.g., development, staging, production) and enable easy rollbacks in case of issues.

title: Develop Testing Strategy
description: Define and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, for the ThreatHuntingPlatform.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the ThreatHuntingPlatform, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance manuals.
